TopicTitle: Kerbals die instantly when undocking two Clamp O Trons

Articles.Content: I recreated a Saturn V. I am undocking the lander from the Command module in Munar orbit. Once I undock, all kerbals die instantly.

This is a known bug.  I believe the only solution I saw was to use a stack decoupler between the docking port and disable fuel crossfeed before separating.

 

But may just need to wait for a patch fix
